title: Crime Alert 02.13.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 02.13.19
description:
A little boy vanishes, and thirty-three years later police believe his own mother may have been behind his murder. A five-year-old boy calls 911 to report his mom being stabbed to death inside their home, leads police to a suspect. And in Massachusetts, a judge orders woman to jail after encouraging her boyfriend to kill himself via text messages. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
